result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Current: c/oDodge Correctional Institution, PO Box 661, Waupun, WI 53963-0661 United States  (Effective: 10-27-2022)

Case Called: 12:07 pm
INCLUDES 21CF1561 & 22CF696.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person. Defendant does not appear. 
Date and time set for a Review Hearing to review the counsel status. 
Court has contacted MCJ and they stated that the Defendant was released from their custody on 10/05/2022;
Defendant was possibly transported to Dodge Correctional per online records;
SPD Office is still in the process of looking for counsel for the Defendant. 
DATES:
Review Hearing 11/17/2022 @ 8:45 am (may have to be bumped due to scheduling issue)
Review Hearing 11/30/2022 @ 10:20 am
Adjourned: 12:09 am
Review hearing on October 27, 2022 at 11:45 am.

Clerk: Amy. 
Called: 10:16 a.m. 
INCLUDES 21CF1561 and 22CF696.
State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher. 
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ with Atty Thomas Roley. 

Date and time set for motion hearing re: motion to withdraw on 21CF1561. 
COURT has reviewed motion; Atty Roley makes statement and recites off record discussions with defendant; defendant wishes to fire Atty Roley. 
COURT questions defendant as to representation; Defendant requests to have new counsel. 
COURT advises right of counsel.
COURT makes findings and grants motion for withdraw.
COURT directs SPD office to appoint new counsel and orders Atty Roley to contact SPD. 

COURT notes preliminary hearing has not been held in 22CF696; ADA Brubacher notes time limits were preserved. 

COURT advises prelim needs to be set; defendant would like to have attorney present. 
COURT sets RH for 10/27/22 at 11:45 a.m. to check status of counsel. 

Adj:  10:24 a.m.
Motion hearing on October 4, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Calendar call on September 20, 2022 at 08:05 am.
Atty Roley stated he submitted Mtn to Withdraw; Court has not received it yet
Calendar call on August 23, 2022 at 08:05 am.

Defendant in MCJ; Atty Roley did not appear
CC 8/23/2022 @ 1pm
Pre-trial conference on August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Case Called: 1:24 pm
INCLUDES 21CF1561 & 22CF696.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person. Defendant appears in custody, in person, and with Atty Tom Roley in person.
VRCW.
State has provided an Offer and Discovery to Defense on both files.
